TestCases.Name: TC0002-0103
TestCases.Description: Κατανομές Παγίων - Μεταβολή Αποσβεστέας Κτήσης γραμμής παραστατικού Αποσβέσεων, Πάγια με υποχρεωτική κατανομή BU => Dim1 50%, Dim2 50%
TestCases.Comment: FA : TC0002-0103 with icp TC0002-0100- AllocationProfile : TC0002-0103-01 & TC0002-0103-02 with BU : TC0002-0100-01, TC0002-0100-02 and Dim1 : TC0002-0100-01, TC0002-0100-02 DocumentType : ΓΠΤ with Characteristic : TC0002-0100 and DocumentSeries : TC0002-0100

Actions.Name: AC-00015
Actions.Params: variableName="DepreciationItemGID";sqlBody="select GID from ESFADepreciationItem where fDocumentGID = @fAcqDocument1GID and fItemGID = @ItemGID";sqlParameterNames="fAcqDocument1GID,ItemGID"

Actions.Name: AC-00018

Actions.Name: AC-00034
Actions.Params: variableName="AllocProf";sqlBody="update ESFADepreciationItem set fItemAllocationProfileGID=@AllocProfGID where GID = @DepreciationItemGID2 ";sqlParameterNames="AllocProfGID,DepreciationItemGID2"
